metadata.Title: CVE-2020-17448 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: Telegram Desktop through 2.1.13 allows a spoofed file type to bypass the Dangerous File Type Execution protection mechanism, as demonstrated by use of the chat window with a filename that lacks an extension.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
